Hello and welcome!

This website gathers all the materials for the paper *Estimating the Local Air Pollution Impacts of Cruise Traffic: A Principled Approach for Observational Data* by [Léo Zabrocki](https://lzabrocki.github.io/), [Marion Leroutier](https://marionleroutier.weebly.com/) and [Marie-Abèle Bind](https://biostatistics.massgeneral.org/faculty/marie-abele-bind-phd/).
